channel.title: Want To Quite Runescape? Look Here
channel.description:
[center][b][size=20pt]Quiting Runescape[/size][/b][/center]
Quiting "Runescape" can be hard but if you folow this you will be "Runescape free in no time!
[glow=green,2,300][b][size=15pt]Step1: Getting Off The Computer.[/size][/b][/glow] This is the easyest part of the prossess. You just hop off the computer and walk away.
[glow=green,2,300][b][size=15pt]Step2: Staying Off The Computer.[/size][/b][/glow] Try go outside... Here are some examples. 1.Go For A Walk 2.Climb A Tree 3.Go For A Ride 4.Go Down The Street 5.Wash The Car
Note: I Recomend Wash The Car Then Go Down The Street. (You get money and a ride into town.)
Those are a couple of things you can do outside.
Stuff You Can Do Inside... 1.Listin To The Radio. 2.Clean Up. 3.Have A Snooze. 4.Jump OnYour Bed. 5.Play A Bored Game. 6.Cook Dinner.
Note:I recomend Cook Or Clean Up you get Better Presents for christmas (A.K.A Xmas)
[b][size=10pt][glow=red,2,300]Still Wanting to play?[/glow][/size][/b] You could play for 30 mins or less try limit yourself.
Another Way: Take One Week At A Time... 1st week go on as regular next week go on for a hour less so on and so forth
Regards, 1337 Mage P

i’ve seen her around btw i quit rs cause i decided to have a normal life

item.title: Want To Quite Runescape? Look Here
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

[quote=“Skating On Java, post:4, topic:37899”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=53566.msg661430#msg661430 date=1166734303]
Cool I guess, but I don’t think many of us are addicted to the computer.

I get my share of excersize
[/quote]

You are addicted Most people who are addicted say they arn’t so there Mum’s don’t try and get them off it.

Btw its ‘Quit’ not ‘quite’[/quote]
Argh!thanks a lot!now I’m not sure what to say…If I say I’m not adicted then you people will suspect I’m adicted, and if I say I’m adicted you ppls will still think I’m adicted! I have a better method tho, and it’s fun! My friend was quiting RS yesterday. He gave me his acount, nothing good in it and terrible stats. Guess what I ended up doing? with screams of “fuck Jagex!” I went around from bank to bank screaming various insults and claiming that I macro, asking people where they live…By the time I got done with West Fally bank people in there were beging for a mod, some he can mute me! I t was the most fun I’ve had in Runescape since I started playing!

Read full topic

item.title: Want To Quite Runescape? Look Here
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

PaulT:

[quote]I started swimming and paintballing to stop playing rs…but now I waste tons of money on paintballing

Yeah, I bought my buddy a gun for his birthday for 100$.

Then he had to buy a hopper, c02 tank, c02, paintballs, etc…which ran up to 60$. It’s the gift that keeps taking :D.[/quote]
My friend gave me a $100 gun on my birthday, and another gave me co2 tank and hopper.

Im getting a tippmann 98 custom pro for $215 ( e grip with was board <333 ), with an electric hopper. Im gonna use my old co2 tank but someday I’ll have to switch to nitro.

OH my tippmann can shoot 9 balls per second and 30 balls per second with WAS. I don’t think the hopper will be able to go that fast unless I get a halo tho. Thats another 100 bucks.

Read full topic

i know a better method :
-make a drop party and drop everything you have , after that give out your pass to a guy you dont know , and your done!!

you shall now have no access to your account(unless the one that has gotten your pass is an idiot and doesnt change your pass)
